basics.name: Timur Moziev
basics.label: Node.js Developer
basics.summary: Fullstack Node.js developer with experience in backend and infrastructure setup. Built development environments, CI/CD pipelines, and web apps using modern TypeScript and Svelte stack. Looking to join a team and contribute to production-grade projects.

work.summary: Directed development of infrastructure and internal tools. Designed, deployed and maintained a multiplayer game project, servers, portals, bots, and codebases.
highlights: Built and managed infrastructure: several VPS, VPN, Gitea, Docker.
Developed backend and web interfaces using Node.js (Fastify, TypeScript) and SvelteKit.
Integrated databases (SQLite, MySQL) and payment system APIs.
Contributed to open-source and assisted freelance clients.

work.summary: Maintained microservices for payment and STK processing of a foreign bank.
Supported an application for service organizations. Implemented new modules and a separate reporting app.
highlights: Main stack: Java 8, PostgreSQL, TypeScript, React.
Tools: Linux Ubuntu, GitLab, Jenkins, Jira.
